lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish joined France great Bernard Hinault in second place of the all-time list of Tour de France stage winners when he pipped Andre Greipel on Monday for his second victory in this year's race.

headline.print_headline: Cavendish Edges Greipel to Win Tour Stage Three
headline.main: Cavendish Edges Greipel to Win Tour Stage Three

snippet: Mark Cavendish joined France great Bernard Hinault in second place of the all-time list of Tour de France stage winners when he pipped Andre Greipel on Monday for his second victory in this year's race....
